title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.25 - Compliance with official orders, signals or directions is required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.25 - Compliance with official orders, signals or directions is required

State Regulations

All vehicular traffic in or upon the airport shall at all
times comply with the order, signal or direction of the airport operator. When
such traffic is controlled by official traffic lights, signs, mechanical or
electrical signals, or pavement markings, such lights, signs, signals and
markings shall be obeyed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
